00029 #ifndef _MODBP_H_
00030 #define _MODBP_H_
00031 
00032 #include "in1out.h"
00033 
00034 
00035 class   modBP:  public  in1out {
00036 typedef in1out  baseclass;
00037 
00038 public:
00039         void    init(void);
00040         void    early(event *);
00041 
00042         int     n_stat;                 /* # of states */
00043         double  *ed;                    /* mean cell distances: in case of 0 bit rate is zero,
00044                                            ex then gives the phase duration */
00045         tim_typ **edtables;             // transformation tables for cell distancies.
00046         tim_typ **tables;               // transformation tables for sojourn time distributions
00047         int     state;                  /* current state */
00048         int     time_left;              // the current state still lasts for this number of time slots
00049         int     **trafo;                /* transition probabilities between states, already stored
00050                                            as PDFs */
00051 };
00052 
00053 #endif  // _MODBP_H_
